short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bee fast video 🐝 - Speed up or slow down videos, seek forward and backward, loop, native controls and Picture-in-picture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ speed up (X) and slow down (Z)
✅ seek forward (D) and backward (A)
✅ seek video to % like on YouTube (0 – 9)
✅ play and pause (S)
✅ native video controls (reload the page to turn off)
✅ toggle loop
✅ toggle Picture-in-Picture (P)
✅ enable/disable controls on any website; useful for video conferencing

Improve video watching experience on all websites.

Stay safe and bee fast 🐝
